sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"改进，改善"之意。
means: improve ： 最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。
better ： 多用于口语，指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质，也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
perfect ： 语义强，通常指使方法、技术等达到完善美好的境地。
refine ： 侧重指使语言、仪态等变得文雅、优美，也可指技艺等的提高。

sentence.Network_en: We shall have to refine on our methods of advertising.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得进一步改进做广告的方法.

sentence.Network_en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentence.Network_cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油.

sentence.Network_en: Modern medical techniques refine on those of the past.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代医疗技术比过去的医疗技术要优越.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... referral n. 工作的分派；治疗安排 refine v. 精练；精制；提纯；精炼 refluent a. 倒流的，回流的.
精字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 精湛〖 masterly〗 精制〖 refine〗 精致〖 finesse〗.
个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... reduce 减少，降低（成本等） refine 精练，精制 reform 改革.
《趣味背单词》(免费) - 豆丁网 ... line( 直线) 把松果油 refine( 提炼)* 发动汽车 engine( 发动机) 事迹搬上.

list.abs: 常用托福tpo听力词汇整理_天道留学 ... flatten 变平，变调 refinement 精致，精巧 Uranium 铀.
石油英语词汇(R2)|生物化学专业英语词汇 ... refined white wax 精白蜡 refinement 改进；加密；精炼 refiner 炼油工人.
石油化工专业英语词汇_百度文库 ... tank truck,tanker (汽车)运油罐车,油罐车 refining 炼油 refinery 炼油厂.
保护心脏：远离十大坏习惯-英语点津 ... oversize 大于一般的，太大的 refined 精炼的，精制的 blood clot 血块.
花语_互动百科 ... 纯洁（ Purity） 高雅（refined）（ Refined） 虚伪（ Falsehood）.
房屋重新贷款(Refinance)通常就是通过重新签订一笔新房屋贷款（在房屋净值足够时，新贷款的金额可大于原贷款所剩贷款本金余额…
按揭贷款人随时可以做“再贷款”(Refinance)来拿出大量现金, 或是非常容易地卖掉房产然后套得大笔利润, 生活中活生生的例子信手拈来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from re- 'again' + the verb fine, influenced by French raffiner

entry.def: When a substance is refined, it is made pure by having all other substances removed from it.

example.ex: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
example.tran: 油经过提炼去除天然存在的杂质。

entry.tran: 改进，改善，改良（过程、理论或机器）
entry.def: If something such as a process, theory, or machine is refined, it is improved by having small changes made to it.

example.ex: Surgical techniques are constantly being refined.
example.tran: 外科手术的技术不断得到完善。

means.word_mean: 1. improve or perfect by pruning or polishing;
2. make more complex, intricate, or richer;
3. treat or prepare so as to put in a usable condition;
4. reduce to a fine, unmixed, or pure state; separate from extraneous matter or cleanse from impurities;
5. attenuate or reduce in vigor, strength, or validity by polishing or purifying;

sentences.sentence: "many valuable nutrients are refined out of the foods in our modern diet"

means.word_mean: 6. make more precise or increase the discriminatory powers of;

auth_sentence.content: Joint Industry Projects to refine Solar and Wind tech.
auth_sentence.res_content: Joint Industry Projects to refine Solar and Wind tech.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Joint Industry Projects to refine Solar and Wind tech.

auth_sentence.content: We're not trying to refine those flavors.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're not trying to refine those flavors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're not trying to refine those flavors.

auth_sentence.content: Magician mentors teach students to refine their techniques and presentations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Magician mentors teach students to refine their techniques and presentations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Magician mentors teach students to refine their techniques and presentations.

Sentence.sentence: He has done it by exploring, by experimenting, by developing his own model of the grammar of language, by trying it out and seeing whether it works, by gradually changing it and refining it until it does work.
Can they refine the idea and resubmit it?

means.word_mean: 精炼; 精制; 使纯净

sentences.en: They refine sugar using this way.
sentences.cn: 他们用这种方法精制糖。

sentences.en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油。

means.word_mean: 使文雅高尚; 使去掉粗俗言行; 使变得完善

sentences.en: He has refined his taste and manners.
sentences.cn: 他已使自己的趣味爱好和举止仪态变得高雅完美。

jushi.english: He has refined his taste and manners.
jushi.chinese: 他已使自己的趣味爱好和举止仪态变得高雅完美。

jushi.english: Oil must be refined before it can be used.
jushi.chinese: 石油必须提炼后才能使用。

jushi.english: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
jushi.chinese: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油。
